I have not given up hope, nor will I ever give up hope. If Valve needs to take their time, they very well deserve it. I sit firmly every single day for the past ten years, telling myself, "just five more minutes". I think greatly to myself, that time is but an essence of progression. Each five minutes is another step, no matter how many days I cry myself to sleep.
Un clásico, me lo compré debido a que había jugado el Half-Life 2 hace tiempo y nunca jugué a sus 2 Episodes.

Muito bom o jogo, já zerei o Half-Life 1 e o 2 e também o CS Condition Zero, ambos da empresa VALVE. É uma pena não ter lançado o Episódeo 3 dessa trilogia mas mesmo assim eu dou nota 10. Se querem jogo fácil e com modo história curta eu recomendo este jogo!!! :)

Всё замечательно,всё хорошо,жалко,что коротковатая а так всё замечательно. Самая жуткая из всех частей Half-Life 2!))

More visually polished than the previous with mostly the same general gameplay.

The game (and its predecessor, but to a lesser degree) shows its age the most during the "puzzle" sections, where the methods with which you interact with the world are not up to the task you are required to perform.

Some examples would be nudging cars onto antlion nests, throwing hovering balls into targets etc. This breaks up the actual action and story with unnecessary time wasters that feel more like you're a kindergartener matching wooden shapes than a scientist in a high danger situation.

This flaw in Valve's puzzle design was far less obvious in HL2, and it indicates that HL2E1 had a rushed and ill-considered development in comparison. I still recommend the game, as it's cheap these days and still head and shoulders above EA's entire catalog.

Fun Part of the Half-Life Series.

Pros:
Action & Exciting
Fun Puzzles

Cons:
Weird Sountrack
  Sometimes you'll enter a random room with some enemies. And the game will put on this strange, 
  old-timey, low quality 
  rock+roll music. Usually it's nice to hear music while playing. But this just didn't feel right or fit in, in 
  my opinion.

But yeah... just finished this one. Ready for Episode 2! Can't wait to be disappointed that there's no Half-Life 3!

Es divertido, sigue con la esencia de Half-Life 2, aunque entiendo que quisieron ahcer un sistema episodico de 3 juegos, me hubiera gustado que sea un poco mas largo, me lo pase en 4hs, pero yendo rapido seguro en 2hs lo podria haber terminado, esta pensado para que se pueda usar la Gravity Gun todo el tiempo, lo que es bastante divertido

Half-Life 2: Episode 1 is practically DLC for the Half-Life 2. Not that it's not a full game, it's just very short. I was able to finish it in about 5 hours, if my Steam time tracking do-bober is to be believed. Now, this game was amazing and is great to play right after Half-Life 2. If you played Half-Life 2, play this one! If you haven't, play Half-Life 2 first! These are both amazing games and there is no reason NOT to play it.

Не понимаю, почему любят эту серию. Игра, как игра. Сюжет не интересный,  геймплей тоже, но возможности... их много и с ними забываешь о данных проблемах, вот, только вспомнимаешь, когда, заканчивается игра)) 7/10

A continuation of Half Life 2 that takes place after the ending of Half Life 2. Its light on content so don't expect too much from it and it can be completed in about 3hrs or less. My only real complaints about this game are two fold. The first is that I'd highly recomend memorising where the quick save key is or if you are using a contoller make sure you map it to a button. Reason being is that early in the game you will encounter a very troublesome section and being able to quick save will make  dealing with the frustration caused by it a little more manageable. Second is that if you want to get up to speed going into episode 2 you pretty much have to play this to get up to speed. Now being said this episiode expands the mod support that Half Life 2 has and has a few more mods that are tied to this episode. If you are going to get this get it as part of a bundle.
Лучшая игра

Kann man, muß man aber nicht.

Es in 3-4 Stunden durchspielen, ich habe gemütliche 15 Stunden damit verbracht. Damit beziehe ich mich auf die negative Bewertungen meiner Vorschreiber. Ich spiele um mir die Zeit zu vertreiben und bin nicht auf der Flucht.

Wie erhofft, hat es viel Spass gemacht, meine doch hohen Erwartungen wurden mehr als erfüllt. Das Addon schließt sich lückenlos an Half-Life 2 an und ist spannend erzählt.

Was den Preis betrifft, kann ich nur soviel dazu schreiben, das ich für das ganze Half-Life Paket nur zwischen 7-8 Euro bezahlt habe. Alle Addons mit eingerechnet, so fällt er also garnicht ins Gewicht. Sollte es wieder mal im Sale auftauchen, gibt es nur eine Empfehlung KAUFEN!!!

Ich habe mir eh angewöhnt, Spiele erst später zu kaufen wenn sie z.Bsp. als Game of the Year Edition erscheinen oder wie bei Steam im Paket. Wenn man es dann für cirka 10 Euro bekommt, fällt das eine oder andere schlechte Addon nicht so auf und es ist dann auch nicht so ärgerlich wenn es mal sehr kurz ist.

Als letztes ist noch zu bemerken das es trotz seinen alters auf Windows 10 problemlos läuft.

Half-Life 2: Episode One é um bom jogo, devo dizer que comparando-o com os outros jogos da franquia, ele é muito mais curto e o enredo não tão magnífico, vejo muitos dizendo que nesse jogo vc é a babá da Alyx, não é uma total mentira, mas também não é só isso.

Sim, a maior parte do jogo você passa ao lado de Alyx (que ajuda muito), mas muitas e muitas vezes, como sempre, vai se encontrar sozinho tendo que achar uma forma de voltar para seu curso.

Mas não, de forma alguma, NÃO é um jogo ruim, apenas o menos f0da dos outros.

Mas mesmo assim, Gordon ainda é o cara, e ponto final.

It's a short, sweet little chunk of Half Life. For any fan, it is a must-have. 

While there is quite a good chunk of game, the story aspect is sadly lacking. It feels more like an extended epilogue to Half Life 2 rather than an episodic continuation. 

Sadly, as we all know, Valve will never make a full ending to this series, so we have to make do with what we've got. If you're itching for more of the series, HL2:E1 doesn't add anything new, but it gives us another reason to visit City 17 for just a few more hours.
